DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Partial Pressure of Oxygen Measurement Arterial Blood Gas Measurement Reduced Outcome Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether resting or exercise arterial pO2 was reduced.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Partial Pressure of Oxygen Measurement Arterial Blood Gas Measurement Reduced Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for the partial pressure of oxygen, the pressure of oxygen dissolved in the blood and how well oxygen is able to move from the airspace of the lungs into the blood, as part of an arterial blood gas sample and a reduced (made less in size or amount or degree) outcome.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredName: Partial Pressure of Oxygen Measurement Arterial Blood Gas Measurement Reduced Outcome
Property.preferredDefinition: Measures the pressure of oxygen dissolved in the blood and how well oxygen is able to move from the airspace of the lungs into the blood.:Measures the acidity (pH) and the levels of oxygen, carbon dioxide, and bicarbonate in the blood.:Reduced; made less in size or amount or degree.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: Measures the pressure of oxygen dissolved in the blood and how well oxygen is able to move from the airspace of the lungs into the blood.
Measures the acidity (pH) and the levels of oxygen, carbon dioxide, and bicarbonate in the blood.
Made less in size or amount or degree.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Resting or Exercise Arterial
ReferenceDocuments.description: Resting or Exercise Arterial pO2 <= 55 mm Hg or SpO2 <= 88%

DataElement.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form
